maqras.text: Kandi uburanga bwose (ku munsi w’imperuka) buzaba bwaciye bugufi imbere ya (Allah), Uhoraho akanabeshaho ibiriho byose. Kandi inkozi z’ibibi zizakorwa n’ikimwaro
N’ukora ibyiza kandi ari umwemera, ntazigera atinya kurenganywa cyangwa kwamburwa (ibyiza yakoze)
Uko ni ko twahishuye Qur’an mu rurimi rw’Icyarabu, tunayisobanuramo ibibaburira kugira ngo barusheho gutinya (Allah) cyangwababikuremo isomo
Ubutungane ni ubwa Allah, Umwami w’ukuri. Bityo (yewe Muhamadi) ntukagire ubwira (mu kwakira) Qur’anmbere y’uko kuyiguhishurira birangira. Ahubwo ujye uvuga uti "Nyagasani wanjye! Nyongerera ubumenyi
Kandi rwose mbere twari twarahaye Adamu isezerano (ryo kutarya ku giti cyo mu ijuru), ariko yaribagiwe (akiryaho), dusanga atarazirikanye (isezerano ryacu)
Unibuke ubwo twabwiraga abamalayika tuti "Mwubamire Adamu!" Nuko barubama, uretse Ibilisi (Shitani) wabyanze
Nuko turavuga tuti "Yewe Adamu! Mu by’ukuri, uyu ni umwanzi wawe, wowe n’umugore wawe. Bityo, muramenye ntazabakure mu ijuru mutazavaho mukagorwa
Mu by’ukuri, nta nzara uzarigiriramo ndetse nta n’ubwo uzariburiramo icyo kwambara
Kandinta nyota uzarigiriramo ndetse nta n’ubwo uzicwa n’izuba
Nuko shitani imwoshya igira iti "Yewe Adamu! Ese nkurangire igiti (waryaho) ukazabaho iteka ndetse (ukazanagira) ubwami budashira

Nuko bombi (Adamu na Hawa) bakiryaho maze ubwambure bwabo bujya ahagaragara, bityo batangira kubutwikirizaamababi (y’ibiti) byo mu busitani bwo mu Ijuru. Nuko Adamu aba yigometse kuri Nyagasaniwe, maze arayoba
Hanyuma Nyagasani we aramutoranya, yakira ukwicuza kwe aranamuyobora

(Allah) aravuga ati "Nimumanuke mwembi murivemo (mujye ku isi), bamwe bazaba abanzi b’abandi (abantu bazaba abanzi ba Shitani, ndetse na we abe umwanzi wa bo). Kandi umuyoboro wanjye nuramuka ubagezeho, uzakurikira uwo muyoboro wanjye ntazigera ayoba cyangwa ngo agorwe
Ariko uzirengagiza urwibutso rwanjye, mu by’ukuri, azagira ubuzima bw’inzitanendetse no ku munsi w’imperukatuzamuzura ari impumyi
Azavuga ati "Nyagasani wanjye! Ni kuki unzuye ndi impumyi kandi (ku isi) narabonaga
(Allah) azavuga ati "Uko ni ko bigomba kumera, (kuko) ibimenyetso byacu byakugezeho ukabyiyibagiza; nonenawe uyu munsi uribagiranye
Uko ni nako duhana uwarengereye ntiyemere ibimenyetso bya Nyagasani we. Kandi rwose ibihano byo ku munsi w’imperukani byo bikazendetse bizahoraho
Ese ntibibagaragarira ko tworetse ibisekuru byinshi mbere yabo, bakaba banyura mu matongo yabo?Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo inyigisho ku bantu bafite ubwenge
Kandi iyo bitaza kubaijambo ryaturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe ryabanje (ryo kudahaniraho) ndetse ntihanabeho igihe cyagenwe (cyo guhanwa), byari kuba ihame ko bacirwaho iteka (hano ku isi)

Bityo, ujye wihanganira ibyo bavuga (yewe Muhamadi), unatagatifuze ikuzo rya Nyagasani wawe mbere y’uko izuba rirasa na mbere y’uko rirenga, ndetse ujye unatagatifuza (ikuzo rye) mu bihe by’ijoro no mu mpera z’amanywa; kugira ngo uzagire ibyishimo (by’ingororano za Nyagasani wawe)

Kandi ntuzarambure amaso yawe urangamira ibyo twahaye amatsinda anyuranye muri bo (ababangikanyamana) bishimishe, (kuko) kugira ari ngo imitako y’ubuzima bw’isi (twabahaye) ngo tuyibageragereshe. Kandi ingororanoNyagasani wawe azatanga (mu ijuru) ni zo nziza ndetse zizahoraho
Kandi ujye ubwiriza abo mu rugo iwawe gukora amasengesho ndetse unayahozeho. Ntitujya tugusaba amafunguro, kuko ari twe tuyaguha. Kandiiherezo ryizani iry’abatinya (Allah)
(Abahakanye) baravuga bati "Kuki (Muhamadi) atatuzanira igitangaza giturutse kwa Nyagasani we?" Ese ntibagezweho n’igitangaza (Qur’an) gishimangira ibyavuzwe mu bitabo byabanje (Tawurati n’Ivanjili)
N’iyo tuza kubarimbuzaibihano mbere ye (Muhamadi), mu by’ukuri, bari kuvuga bati "Nyagasani wacu! Iyo uza kutwoherereza intumwa, twari gukurikira amagambo yawe mbere y’uko dusuzugurika ngo tunasebe
Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Buri wese arategereje, bityo namwe nimutegereze, muzamenya abari mu nzira igororotse kandi bayobotse
